item.title: Self-Styled 'Swamiji' Kidnaps 4 Boys In Karnataka's Raichur, Demands Ransom; Arrested
item.description:
<![CDATA[Self-Styled 'Swamiji' Kidnaps 4 Boys In Karnataka's Raichur, Demands Ransom; Arrested
Curated By :
Translation Desk
Last Updated: December 25, 2024, 16:23 IST
An astrologer from Raichur, Karnataka, Vishnu Rao, was arrested by Kolar police for kidnapping four boys from Bangarpet.
Astrologer from Raichur arrested for abducting 4 boys from Bangarpet.(Image for representation)
In a shocking case of child abduction, an astrologer from Raichur, Karnataka, was arrested by the Kolar police after k...]]>
item.author: Diksha Modi
